question: when you wake up you see that you're colthes are wet, then you le the semen dry into your clothes, then if you change your pants with out taking a shower, does the second pair of pants become napaaq also
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to know that if you have wet dream, then when you wake up you see that you're colthes are wet, then you le the semen dry into your clothes, then if you change your pants with out taking a shower, does the second pair of pants become napaaq also?

Second, I would like to klnow that from a male's body, which hair has to be shaved, and what length is allowed in those places before it has to be shaved. And if it is not shaved, does any ibadah you do count?

ANSWER


Share:

1. Any clothing which a person wear after semen has dried up will not become Napaak (impure). (Ahsanul Fataawa vol.2)

2. It is necessary for a male and female to remove the pubic hair as well as the hair under the arms. If one allows these hairs to grow over a period of forty days, he will be Makrooh (reprehensible). However, his Ibaadat will be accepted. (Raddul Muhtaar vol.6 pg.407; HM Saeed)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
